ygData.subject: Re: Solo'ing at Higher Levels
ygData.msgSnippet: All I have to say is -WOW-.  You plan to be level 24 by Sunday or Monday ?  I wish I could level that fast ...  I look forward to hearing your secret solo ing
ygData.messageBody:
All I have to say is -WOW-. You plan to be level 24 by Sunday or Monday ? I wish I could level that fast ... I look forward to hearing your secret solo'ing place even though I have attained the 24th level. (I will probably still be 24 when you reach 24.. heheheh)

Valacian - 24th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: John Penman [SMTP:jpenman@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 4:37 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Solo'ing at Higher Levels

From: "John Penman" <jpenman@...>

Well I have finally hit 20th level yesterday and have found a beautiful spot
to solo in for levels 20-24. Once I hit 24th Ill let everyone know where it
is so let the anticipation build. My Soloing tactics are as many have
suggested here, Shoot and root....shoot and root. I would have to disagree
though from what people have said that there is no major difference in Root
and Enstill. I use Enstill now and Love it. I have gotten into situations
when I blast the heck out of a mob and run out of mana, I then sit down and
med for up to 2 bubs of mana then get back in battle and the mob is still
rooted or has just broken free. I love Enstill and think the extra mana it
uses is worth while.

I expect to reach 24 by Sunday so maybe Monday Ill post where this spot is
at.


Shadair J'Axx
20th Wizard
Karana

----- Original Message -----
From: Valacian <abryson@...>
To: 'EQ Wizards' <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 5:21 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Spells, This Forum,Etc.


> From: Valacian <abryson@...>
>
> I can feel the wrath now... but I am ready for the comments.
>
> If I may comment - I don't believe that us discussing what 'would be nice'
for Wizard spells really helps us be Wizards. I really believe that if we
continue to complain or comment on the apparent lack of spells/problems with
spells that we have, we are not going to achieve what I believe this mailing
list was setup for. This list is to share information between all Wizards
within Norrath ! We are going to lose potential and current subscribers (me
and I'm sure others), thus losing valuable shared infortmation because of
our ranting and raving about our class. Remember, Verant is probably not
reading this forum..
>
> My suggestion: Let's talk about ideas and share information that will
help each other play the class that we chose to play.
>
> So far, the most useful thing I have read (besides Spoiler information) is
the 'bug' that allows our Eye of Zoom to unlock doors. I think that's great
!!
>
> Valacian - 24th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking to expand your world?
> http://www.onelist.com
> ONElist has nearly 150,000 e-mail communities from which to chose!
